subNode:value.scalar:string: Adds a block featuring product categories.

scalar:array.comment: // Temporary hooks. Do NOT hook any module on it. Some CRUD hook will replace them as soon as possible.

subNode:value.scalar:string: Set the maximum depth of sublevels displayed in this block (0 = infinite)
How many footer columns would you like?
Define the number of footer columns.

scalar:array.comment: // Get all groups for this customer and concatenate them as a string: "1,2,3..."
// Get all groups for this customer and concatenate them as a string: "1,2,3..."

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT DISTINCT c.id_parent, c.id_category, cl.name, cl.description, cl.link_rewrite FROM `
category_lang` cl ON (c.`id_category` = cl.`id_category` AND cl.`id_lang` =
category_shop` cs ON (cs.`id_category` = c.`id_category` AND cs.`id_shop` =

scalar:array.comment: // Get all groups for this customer and concatenate them as a string: "1,2,3..."

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT DISTINCT c.id_parent, c.id_category, cl.name, cl.description, cl.link_rewrite FROM `
category_lang` cl ON (c.`id_category` = cl.`id_category` AND cl.`id_lang` =
category_group` cg ON (cg.`id_category` = c.`id_category`) WHERE (c.`active` = 1 OR c.`id_category` = 1)
